cause.description:
Marriage is a way to show that you love someone and that you are willing to spend the rest of your life with them. You are in love. Great now only straight people can get married because it's 'normal'. Gays and lesbians should also have that right! Love is the reason for marriage!
1. Same sex marriage should be part of life.
cause.mission: give rights to same sex marriage
cause.name: marriage = person + person
